sentences.en: Colleges have been slow to adjust to the challenges they’ve encountered, but are beginning to try new strategies, both to better acclimate students and to deal with the application problems.
sentences.cn: 学校在适应他们遇到的挑战上已经慢了，但也开始尝试一些新策略，在让学生更好的适应环境和处理入学申请问题上。

sentences.en: Editors only constantly promote and transcend themselves then enable acclimate the request of the times growth.
sentences.cn: 只有不断提高和超越自我,编辑人员才能适应时代发展的要求.

sentences.en: Hold the vision and trust that the Universe will acclimate to your vision.
sentences.cn: 坚持你的远见和信任,整个宇宙将回应你的远见.

sentences.en: I still have an odd sense of humor, and it takes most people to acclimate.
sentences.cn: 最近, 听说我越来越酷,可是很多人还觉得我比较奇怪.没关系.

sentences.en: Laboratory scale EGSB was operated to cultivate and acclimate anaerobic sludge treating mono - chlorphenols ( 2 - CP , 4 - CP ) simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 利用实验室规模的EGSB反应器 驯化得到降解邻氯酚(2-CP)和对氯酚 ( 4-CP ) 的厌氧颗粒污泥.

sentences.en: Once in France , a country he greatly admired , Christophe found it acclimate himself.
sentences.cn: 在她回法国时, 克利斯朵夫曾在火车上看到她一眼.

sentences.en: Several things can be done to help the snake acclimate.
sentences.cn: 可以通过几件事帮助这些蛇去适应新环境.

sentences.en: Some earth plants that I will try to acclimate to the moon.
sentences.cn: 我将设法使一些地球植物适应月球的环境。

words.tran_cn: 适应环境；[动][进化] 驯化；服水土；[气候] 气候适应
使适应新环境，使服水土

trans.tran_cn: 使适应新环境，使服水土服水土，适应
